Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionManager
    Class to manage the possible actions in a round
    ActionManagerTest  
    Controller
    Controller class: is the interface between the virtual view and the controller's class that manage the game logic Receive the updates from the virtual view perform the correlated methods and send to the virtual view the request message for the clients
    DeathManager
    Class to manage the death and the respawn of the players
    DeathManagerTest  
    DisconnectionManager
    Class to manage players disconnection e reconnection.
    DisconnectionManagerTest  
    FirstRoundManager
    Extension of the RoundManager to manage the first round of the players
    FirstRoundManagerTest  
    GameManager
    Class to manage the game
    GameManagerTest  
    RoundManager
    The class that manage the flow of the rounds
    RoundManagerTest  
    SetUpObserverObservable
    Class to manage the adding of the observers
    ValidatorTest
